alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 7:56PM CST until March 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 14.0 feet through tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Illinois River Valley City 14.0 14.0 Wed 7 pm 14.0 14.0 13.9 13.8 13.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
